00030 #define __UNINITIALIZED__ (-1)
00031 
00032 class EffectDtmf : public Generator {
00033 
00034  public:
00035    EffectDtmf() : mIsSelection(false) {
00036       SetEffectFlags(BUILTIN_EFFECT | INSERT_EFFECT);
00037    }
00038 
00039    virtual wxString GetEffectName() {
00040       return wxString(_("DTMF Tones..."));
00041    }
00042 
00043    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories() {
00044      std::set<wxString> result;
00045      result.insert(wxT("http://lv2plug.in/ns/lv2core#GeneratorPlugin"));
00046      return result;
00047    }
00048 
00049    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier() {
00050       return wxString(wxT("DTMFTone"));
00051    }
00052 
00053    virtual wxString GetEffectDescription() {
00054       return wxString::Format(_("Applied effect: Generate DTMF tones, %.6lf seconds"), mDuration);
00055    }
00056 
00057    virtual wxString GetEffectAction() {
00058       return wxString(_("Generating DTMF tones"));
00059    }
00060 
00061    virtual bool Init();
00062    virtual bool PromptUser();
00063    virtual bool TransferParameters( Shuttle & shuttle );
00064 
00065  private:
00066    sampleCount numSamplesSequence, numSamplesTone, numSamplesSilence;
00067 
00068    wxString dtmfString;       // dtmf tone string
00069    int    dtmfNTones;         // total number of tones to generate
00070    double dtmfTone;           // duration of a single tone in ms
00071    double dtmfSilence;        // duration of silence between tones in ms
00072    double dtmfDutyCycle;      // ratio of dtmfTone/(dtmfTone+dtmfSilence)
00073    double dtmfAmplitude;      // amplitude of dtmf tone sequence, restricted to (0-1)
00074    bool mIsSelection;
00075 
00076  protected:
00077    virtual bool MakeDtmfTone(float *buffer, sampleCount len, float fs,
00078                              wxChar tone, sampleCount last,
00079                              sampleCount total, float amplitude);
00080    bool GenerateTrack(WaveTrack *tmp, const WaveTrack &track, int ntrack);
00081    void Success();
00082 
00083  // friendship ...
00084  friend class DtmfDialog;
00085 
00086 };

00119 
00120    DECLARE_EVENT_TABLE()
00121 
00122  public:
00123    wxString dString;       // dtmf tone string
00124    int    dNTones;         // total number of tones to generate
00125    double dTone;           // duration of a single tone
00126    double dSilence;        // duration of silence between tones
00127    double dDuration;       // duration of the whole dtmf tone sequence
00128    double dDutyCycle;      // ratio of dTone/(dTone+dSilence)
00129    double dAmplitude;      // amplitude of dtmf tone sequence, restricted to (0-1)
00130    bool   dIsSelection;    // true if duration comes from selection

00132 };
